metadata.title: ★ THE BLACK CHEETAHS ★
metadata.description: The Black Cheetahs Official site. The Black Cheetahs is the Berlin-based project of music producer and artist Sofia TK, pianist Jack Wendy and Christian Gjelstrup on the bass. Their music bears the imprint of southern garage rock combined with post-modern electronics: A deep doomish sound of slow bpm's and a dark bluesy feel with an edge. Their punk-hypnotic show and deep immersive sound is gaining them followers from the dark rock and experimental scenes alike. A cathodic soundtrack that recalls and celebrates the spirit of sex, drugs, and rock'n'roll from its dark side. Debut album Slow Doomed Fever out now.

about.paragraph1: The Black Cheetahs are a Berlin-based project by music producer and artist Sofia TK, pianist Jack Wendy, and bassist Christian Gjelstrup. Their music bears the imprint of southern garage rock combined with post-modern electronics: a deep, doomish sound of slow BPMs and a dark, bluesy feel with an edge.
about.paragraph2: Their punk-hypnotic show and deeply immersive sound are gaining them followers from the dark rock and experimental scenes alike. A cathartic soundtrack that recalls and celebrates the spirit of sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll from its dark side.
